sect2.title: Patching Linux-2.4.19 for XFS
sect2.para: Build an XFS-enabled Linux 2.4.19 kernel with the following commands:

screen.userinput: cd /usr/src/linux && make mrproper && bzcat ../xfs-2.4.19-all-i386.bz2 | patch -Np1 && make menuconfig && make dep && make bzImage && make modules && make modules_install && cp arch/i386/boot/bzImage /boot/vmlinuz-xfs && cp System.map /boot/System.map-xfs
